title: Teenage Sensation Seixas Denies Ayuso, Almeida in Battle of Cycling’s Rising Stars
content:
French prodigy Seixas stuns the favorites in wild summit finale for first pro win, Riccitello fifth in race loaded with cycling's rising stars.

Read the full article at Teenage Sensation Seixas Denies Ayuso, Almeida in Battle of Cycling’s Rising Stars on Velo.
author: ahood
